content:
https://znlive.com/how-to-use-pgo-to-improve-the-performance


export DOTNET_ReadyToRun=0 # Disable AOT
export DOTNET_TieredPGO=1 # Turn on layered PGO
export DOTNET_TC_QuickJitForLoops=1 # Enable Quick Jit for loop
dotnet run -c Release
dotnet publish -c Release -r linux-x64 /p:PublishReadyToRun=true /p:PublishReadyToRunComposite=true
title: How to use PGO to improve the performance of .NET programs
